channel.title: Tag
channel.description:
Ehh, i've been testing out my skills with c4d's this whole night. Wasn't happy with anything although I'm seeking advice on what I can do better. Here's a little something I made.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qxpBcko.png[/img]

item.title: Tag
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:6, topic:539032”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=657871.msg4400572#msg4400572 date=1390525723]
Ehh, i’ve been testing out my skills with c4d’s this whole night. Wasn’t happy with anything although I’m seeking advice on what I can do better. Here’s a little something I made.


[/quote]

Man idk, I just don’t really like it. The blurring is really odd and there is no depth, the blurring on the outside is what catches my eye, making it the center piece. Do something to the iron man head to make it stick out more. Also give it more depth.[/quote]
oo i forgot to edit this thread, this ones old and the first attempt at working with c4d’s…

ill post some later

Read full topic

item.title: Tag
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:1, topic:539032”]Ehh, i’ve been testing out my skills with c4d’s this whole night. Wasn’t happy with anything although I’m seeking advice on what I can do better. Here’s a little something I made.

[/quote]

Man idk, I just don’t really like it. The blurring is really odd and there is no depth, the blurring on the outside is what catches my eye, making it the center piece. Do something to the iron man head to make it stick out more. Also give it more depth.

Read full topic
